description: New Sleeker UI + Improved Performance! O'Chatter provides a new way to chat with other Pre, Pixi, and Veer users. O'Chatter communication technology is based off of Bob Chatter code-base. Some of the most unique features are multiple "instances" -- Chat getting long and boring, start a new "instance" older instances go into "sleep mode", and awoken with activity.   O'Chatter is easy to use: no registration necessary unique usernames are automatically generated. Use a unique username everytime. Features include: instances, sleepy-threads, custom colors, custom background images, shorten urls, import twitter avatar, and much more. Join the 7,350+ registered users. Chat with B* Chatr and Bob Chatter users. Lovely day for O'Chatter!
